name: UIDatePicker
desc: A control for the inputting of date and time values.

items.name: var calendar: Calendar!
items.desc: The calendar to use for the date picker.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The date displayed by the date picker.

items.name: var locale: Locale?
items.desc: The locale used by the date picker.

items.name: func setDate(Date, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the date to display in the date picker, with an option to animate the setting.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone reflected in the date displayed by the date picker.

items.name: var datePickerMode: UIDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: The mode of the date picker.

items.name: enum UIDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: The mode displayed by the date picker.

items.name: var datePickerStyle: UIDatePickerStyle
items.desc: The current style of the date picker.

items.name: var preferredDatePickerStyle: UIDatePickerStyle
items.desc: The preferred style of the date picker.

items.name: enum UIDatePickerStyle
items.desc: Styles that determine the appearance of a date picker.

items.name: var maximumDate: Date?
items.desc: The maximum date that a date picker can show.

items.name: var minimumDate: Date?
items.desc: The minimum date that a date picker can show.

items.name: var minuteInterval: Int
items.desc: The interval at which the date picker should display minutes.

items.name: var countDownDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The value displayed by the date picker when the mode property is set to show a countdown time.
